name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment - glucosamine and chondroitin
title: cost per 1000 patients
description: Cost of glucosamine and chondroitin per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: Glucosamine and chondroitin are nutrition supplements which are taken to improve pain associated with osteoarthritis.
However, there is little evidence of benefit and NICE do not recommend their use in osteoarthritis.
numerator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '1001050A0%' OR     --Glucosamine Hydrochloride (Rheumatic) 
bnf_code LIKE '1001050B0%'   OR --Glucosamine Sulf (Rheumatic) (brands and generic) 
bnf_code = '091200000AADGDG' OR --Glucosamine Sulf_Tab 500mg
